mods.abstract: Two color window card (light blue and black on white) announcing the 23rd Annual Bicycle Ride Across Tennessee (BRAT) on September 8-15. Poster features a woodcut of the a bicyclist and a metal photoplate of a bridge. Event benefits the Cumberland Trail Conference and The Tennessee Park Rangers Association.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
